title: Mardi Gras, New Orleans, LA
marks:
Signature; Date; Title; Edition

in pencil, on b in pencil, on back: [Toby Old 1979]
description: clockwise from left edge: man with shoulder-length hair wearing a dark coat and pants and a ruffled shirt; woman wearing a white suit and hat with fur-trimmed coat; man wearing a large headdress with feathers and metal chains, with a feathered g-string and feathered flip-flops; a woman with her hands behind her head, wearing heavy makeup and sequined lingere; kneeling man with a banana painted on his face
